1.1/Repository.defaultValue: National Centre for Truth and Reconciliation (NCTR)
1.1/Repository.helpMessage: The name of the institution that accepts legal responsibility for the accessioned material

1.2/AccessionIdentifier.helpMessage: A unique and persistent code that is assigned to the accessioned material

1.3.1/OtherIdentifierTypes.helpMessage: One or more types of identifiers that identify the material (i.e., Barcode, Receipt Number, etc.)

1.3.2/OtherIdentifierValues.helpMessage: One or more codes that identify the material

1.3.3/OtherIdentifierNotes.helpMessage: Any notes relating to fields 1.3.1 and 1.3.2

1.5/ArchivalUnit.helpMessage: The archival unit or the aggregate to which the accessioned material will belong

1.6/AcquisitionMethod.helpMessage: The method by which the materials are being acquired

1.7/DispositionAuthority.helpMessage: A reference to policies, directives, and agreements that prescribe and allow for the transfer of material to a repository
